name: Hope at Dawn -Operation Manhattan
description:
Soldier

                 we still don't know how to close the portals. For the last 6 months, humanity has been increasingly reduced and forced to leave the cities.

But we have a new hope, Manhattan.

A few days ago we managed to insert a base in New York, your job is to defend it and wait for reinforcements... we will send several units to help you, you have their locations, they are in charge of attacking automatically.

The situations are not easy, do not underestimate the enemy waves.



THE GAME - 

Use the mouse to select your soldier, or press your hotkey.

With WASD you can move and position them depending on the need.

The soldiers are in charge of firing automatically, just concentrate on the location of it.

With the satellite (Space Bar) you can have an overview of the situation between allies and enemies.

MISSION

Your HQ cannot be destroyed, although a soldier can fall, you can use the mechanic call (button next to the soldier number) and the vehicle will come to fix you. Keep in mind that the game is increasing the difficulty and that you have MORE THAN 40MIN TO FINAL GAME
